pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mutual Information Estimators // Provides mutual information estimators based on k-nearest neighbor estimators by A. Kraskov, et al. (2004) doi:10.1103/PhysRevE.69.066138, S. Gao, et al. (2015) http://proceedings.mlr.press/v38/gao15.pdf and local density estimators by W. Gao, et al. (2017) doi:10.1109/ISIT.2017.8006749.
